price: Au huwachanganya wanaume na wanawake, na akamfanya amtakaye tasa. Hakika Yeye ni Mjuzi Mwenye uweza.
arabic: أَوۡ يُزَوِّجُهُمۡ ذُكۡرَانٗا وَإِنَٰثٗاۖ وَيَجۡعَلُ مَن يَشَآءُ عَقِيمًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٞ قَدِيرٞ
footnotes: Na Yeye Subhanahu humfadhili amtakaye kwa kumchanganyia wanaume na wanawake, na akamfanya amtakaye bila ya mtoto yeyote. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu anajua vyema kila kitu. Ni Muweza wa kutenda kila akitakacho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aw yuzawwijuhum dhuk'rānan wa-ināthan wayajʿalu man yashāu ʿaqīman innahu ʿalīmun qadīrun
